front.title: A YANG Data Model and RADIUS Extension for Policy-based Network Access Control

abstract.t: This document defines a YANG data model for policy-based network access control, which provides consistent and efficient enforcement of network access control policies based on group identity. Moreover, this document defines a mechanism to ease the maintenance of the mapping between a user group identifier and a set of IP/MAC addresses to enforce policy-based network access control. In addition, the document defines a RADIUS attribute that is used to communicate the user group identifier as part of identification and authorization information.
